Title: avg(numeric_expr)
Description: compute the average of the non-NULL integer/float/decimal/month_interval values in the column or group

Title: count(*)
Description: count the number of rows in the column or group including those who may have NULL values

Title: count(col_expr)
Description: count the number of non-NULL values in the column or group

Title: count(distinct col_expr)
Description: count the number of distinct non-NULL values in the column or group

Title: max(col_expr)
Description: return the maximum non-NULL value in the column or group

Title: min(col_expr)
Description: return the minimum non-NULL value in the column or group

Title: prod(numeric_expr)
Description: compute the product of the non-NULL numeric values in the column or group

Title: prod(distinct numeric_expr)
Description: compute the product of the distinct non-NULL numeric values in the column or group

Title: sum(integer_expr)
Description: compute the sum of all non-NULL integer values in the column or group

Title: sum(distinct integer_expr)
Description: compute the sum of all distinct non-NULL integer values in the column or group

Title: sum(decimal_expr)
Description: compute the sum of all non-NULL decimal values in the column or group

Title: sum(float_expr)
Description: compute the sum of all non-NULL floating point values in the column or group

Title: sum(month_interval_expr)
Description: compute the sum of all non-NULL interval month values in the column or group

Title: sum(sec_interval_expr)
Description: compute the sum of all non-NULL interval second values in the column or group

Title: listagg(col_expr)
Description: concatenate non-NULL values in a column or group into one large varchar string with values separated by a comma (the default separator). Supported from release Jun2020 (11.37.7)

Title: listagg(col_expr, separator_str)
Description: concatenate non-NULL values in a column or group into one large varchar string with values separated by separator_str. Supported from release Jun2020 (11.37.7)

Title: sys.group_concat(col_expr)
Description: concatenate non-NULL values in a column or group into one large string with values separated by a comma (the default separator)

Title: sys.group_concat(col_expr, separator_str)
Description: concatenate non-NULL values in a column or group into one large string with values separated by separator_str

Title: json.tojsonarray(clob)
Description: convert string values in the column or group into a json array string

Title: json.tojsonarray(double)
Description: convert numeric values in the column or group into a json array string

Title: sys.corr(numeric_a, numeric_b)
Description: return the correlation coefficient of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double) column or group numeric_a versus numeric_b

Title: sys.covar_pop(numeric_a, numeric_b)
Description: return the population covariance of numeric_expr of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double/interval) column or group numeric_a versus numeric_b. Supported from release Jun2020 (11.37.7)

Title: sys.covar_samp(numeric_a, numeric_b)
Description: return the sample covariance of numeric_expr of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double/interval) column or group numeric_a versus numeric_b. Supported from release Jun2020 (11.37.7)

Title: sys.median(col_expr)
Description: return the statistic median of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double) or temporal (date/time/timestamp/interval) column or group

Title: sys.median_avg(numeric_expr)
Description: return the statistic median average of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double) column or group

Title: sys.quantile(col_expr, percentile)
Description: return the statistic quantile of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double) or temporal (date/time/timestamp/interval) column or group. The percentile argument must be between 0.0 and 1.0

Title: sys.quantile_avg(numeric_expr, percentile)
Description: return the statistic quantile average of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double) column or group. The percentile argument must be between 0.0 and 1.0

Title: sys.stddev_pop(numeric_expr)
Description: return the population standard deviation of numeric_expr of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double/interval) column or group. Same as the square root of var_pop().

Title: sys.stddev_samp(numeric_expr)
Description: return the sample standard deviation of numeric_expr of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double/interval) column or group. Same as the square root of var_samp().

Title: sys.var_pop(numeric_expr)
Description: return the population standard variance of numeric_expr of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double/interval) column or group. Same as the square of stddev_pop().

Title: sys.var_samp(numeric_expr)
Description: return the sample standard variance of numeric_expr of the non-NULL values in the numeric (integer/decimal/real/double/interval) column or group. Same as the square of stddev_samp().
